fields.label: Navbar Items
fields.name: header_default
fields.instructions: Enable the items in the Navbar that should be visible in the Desktop Version. (Screens larger than 576px).

fields.label: Responsive Menu
fields.name: header_responsive
fields.instructions: Enable the items in the Menu that should be visible in the Mobile Version. (Screens smaller than 576px).

fields.label: Container
fields.name: header_container
fields.instructions: Choose the width of the Navbar Container.

fields.label: Vertical Spacing
fields.name: header_vertical_spacing
fields.instructions: Choose the Vertical Spacing of the Navbar.

fields.label: Navbar Mode
fields.name: navbar_mode
fields.instructions: Choose how the Navbar should behave when scrolling the page.

fields.label: Message
fields.message: Enter the texts for the Search Section of the website, which is displayed when the Search Button on the Navbar is clicked.

fields.label: Description
fields.name: search_description
fields.default_value: Type a few words to find the available content.

fields.label: Social Icons
fields.name: social_networks
fields.instructions: Here you can add Social Network Icons for the Navbar. Add a Custom Item for more freedom.

fields.label: Message
fields.message: Here you can configure a Primary Button for the Navbar. Usually used to take the contact page.

fields.label: Message
fields.message: Here you can configure a Custom Icon for the Navbar. Usually used to take the external login page.
